unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Consider P.T. Usha's journey. Her 1984 Los Angeles Olympics performance, despite a heartbreaking miss on 06/08/1984, remains inspiring. A detailed biography could explore challenges faced, like societal pressures in Payyoli, Kerala, and support from institutions. Also, analysis of her 400m hurdle times (e.g., in Jakarta on 01/10/1982 at 15:00 hrs) should be included. Rs. 50,000 award details are welcome. 15/08/1990.
normalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Consider P. T. Usha's journey. Her one thousand nine hundred and eighty four Los Angeles Olympics performance, despite a heartbreaking miss on sixth august one thousand nine hundred and eighty four, remains inspiring. A detailed biography could explore challenges faced, like societal pressures in Payyoli, Kerala, and support from institutions. Also, analysis of her four hundred meter hurdle times (e.g., in Jakarta on first october one thousand nine hundred and eighty two at fifteen hundred hours) should be included. Rupee fifty thousand award details are welcome. fifteenth august one thousand nine hundred and ninety.
